content:
TargetMode Enum

Definition

Specifies whether the target of a PackageRelationship is inside or outside the Package.

In this Article

public enum TargetMode
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
TargetMode

Remarks

If the target is inside the Package (Internal), the relationship TargetUri is always a relative URI.

If the target is outside the Package (External), the relationship TargetUri can be either relative to the current location of the package or an absolute URI.

Fields

External

The relationship references a resource that is external to the package.
Internal

The relationship references a part that is inside the package.
